name: Orikami
description:
How to Play

Space bar to jump
Arrows to move around
Enter to pass thourgh the doors or select a level on the menu screen

Orikami Team


Aurélie Gleizes - game designer and art director

Anissa Tufail - game designer and community manager


Cindy Bourgeot - level designer and UI artist


Stuart Sulaski - developer
